mapper.insert: insert into t_baby_apply (id, user_code, create_time, apply_status, require_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requireCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, user_code, create_time, apply_status, require_code from t_baby_apply
mapper.delete: delete from t_baby_apply where id IN #{item}
